channel.title: Minigame's help creating one?
channel.description:
okay everyone on my server wants me to add a minigame that has say ... 3 rounds and each round is 2 minutes long and the last person alive gets gp or mystery item... is their anysuch minigame or how could i make one like this?!?!
thanks
